Decoding the binary file of focus mins:

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 00100000
00 00 00 0C 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F0 00 00 00 00 11000000, 11110000
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C0 00 00 00 00 00 11000000
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 11100000
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00                                      

Above = 12 focus mins


------------------------------------------------

Hour 0
00000000 - so 10000000 would be hex 80 which means first minute had focus. 11000000 is hex C0 which means first two mins had focus.
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
0000

Hour 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
0000

60 bits in each hour, each representing one minute of focus.


let useTime = [5,1,1,2,4,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,60,0,30,0,0,0,0,0,0,30,60];

11111000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
0000
